record.description: Woman students of the University of Chicago offered a terpsichorean tribute to spring in a program of ballet-type "modern" dances on the greensward of the campus. Katherine Manning (instructor) in a graceful leap, with left to right: Georgia Anderson, Ruth Cooper, Dorothy Duncan, Helen Hursh, Janet Johnson, Josephine Kelly, Helaine Mosses, Marial Pliss, and Gloria Warner.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
